attributes.action: Takes steps to create an Anglophile Union of the English speaking countries of the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is currently a member of the European Union, a group of countries with which it has virtually nothing in common, either culturally, linguistically or economically. An Anglophile Union of the English speaking countries of the world, ie UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Ireland etc would benefit all of us who join and free the EU from having a member country with a population totally opposed to it's existence.
